alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:38PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lauderdale, northeastern Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 738 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lexington, or 19 miles northeast of Florence, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Lexington, Anderson, Center Star, Kingtown, Oliver, Whitehead and Elgin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
